title: Professional attendance by a general practitioner
desc: Professional attendance by a general practitioner at consulting rooms, surgery or hospital if the attendance is for less than 20 minutes duration

title: Professional attendance by a general practitioner - prolonged
desc: Professional attendance by a general practitioner exceeding 20 minutes but not exceeding 40 minutes duration

title: Professional attendance by a general practitioner - extended
desc: Professional attendance by a general practitioner exceeding 40 minutes duration

title: GP management plan
desc: Preparation of a GP Management Plan for a patient with a chronic or terminal medical condition

title: Team care arrangement
desc: Preparation of a Team Care Arrangement involving multiple healthcare providers for coordinated patient care

title: GP review of plan
desc: Review of a GP Management Plan or Team Care Arrangement by a general practitioner

title: Allied health follow-up
desc: Follow-up consultation by allied health professional for ongoing treatment and care

title: Specialist consultation <20min
desc: Professional attendance by a specialist for consultation lasting less than 20 minutes

title: Specialist consultation >20min
desc: Professional attendance by a specialist for consultation lasting more than 20 minutes

title: Chest XR (lung fields)
desc: Chest X-ray examination focused on lung fields for diagnostic imaging of respiratory system

title: Chest XR + fluoroscopy
desc: Chest X-ray examination with fluoroscopy for real-time imaging of chest cavity and respiratory function

title: Abdomen ultrasound
desc: Ultrasound examination of abdomen including internal organs for diagnostic imaging

title: MRI brain
desc: Magnetic Resonance Imaging of the brain for detailed diagnostic imaging of neurological structures

title: Spirometry full
desc: Complete spirometry test including forced vital capacity and flow volume measurements for respiratory function assessment

title: Mental health treatment plan
desc: Preparation of a GP Mental Health Treatment Plan for patients with mental health conditions

title: Clinical psychology consult
desc: Professional consultation by clinical psychologist for psychological assessment and treatment planning

title: Dietitian consult
desc: Professional consultation by dietitian for nutritional assessment and dietary planning

title: Electrocardiogram - 12 lead
desc: 12-lead electrocardiogram including interpretation and report to assess cardiac rhythm and function

title: Review of GP Mental Health Treatment Plan
desc: Review of a GP Mental Health Treatment Plan by a general practitioner for ongoing mental health care

title: Blood collection for pathology testing
desc: Collection of blood sample by venipuncture for pathology testing and laboratory analysis

title: Ultrasound examination of abdomen
desc: Ultrasound examination of abdomen including kidneys, liver, gallbladder, pancreas and spleen - real time scanning

title: Telehealth consultation by general practitioner
desc: Professional video consultation conducted by a general practitioner with a patient not physically present at the same location

title: After-hours GP consultation
desc: Professional attendance by a general practitioner provided between 11pm and 7am on any day, or between 11pm on Saturday and 7am on Monday

title: After-hours GP consultation - prolonged
desc: After-hours professional attendance by a general practitioner exceeding 20 minutes but not exceeding 40 minutes

title: Professional attendance by a specialist
desc: Professional attendance by a specialist where the patient is referred

title: Health assessment for people aged 40-49 years
desc: Health assessment for people aged 40-49 years inclusive who are at risk of developing chronic disease

title: GP mental health consultation
desc: Preparation of a GP Mental Health Treatment Plan by a general practitioner

title: Excision of skin lesion
desc: Excision of malignant or premalignant lesion of the skin by any method
